title: Gravitational Wave Detection and Data Analysis
desc: Explores gravitational wave detection across frequency bands, from CMB polarization to LIGO, and details interferometer response using TT gauge.

title: Gravitational Wave Metric Tensor Calculation
desc: A script to compute gravitational wave metric tensor components in TT gauge for a rotating carbon fiber column source, including critical angular velocity estimation.

title: Feynman Diagrams: A Beginner's Guide
desc: An introductory guide to Feynman diagrams for quantum field theory beginners, covering Dirac equations, scattering calculations, and practical exercises.

title: C++ Programming Basics and Keywords
desc: An introduction to C++ programming fundamentals, covering essential keywords for data types, control flow, functions, and object-oriented concepts.

title: Python Escape Characters Guide
desc: Learn essential Python escape characters like \n and \t for formatting strings, file paths, and special symbols with practical examples.

title: Advanced Calculus: Taylor's Theorem Review
desc: A concise review of Taylor's Theorem, covering Peano's, Lagrange's, and Cauchy's forms of the remainder term for function approximation.

title: Advanced Calculus Series Convergence Analysis
desc: A technical analysis of six infinite series, determining convergence or divergence using comparison, ratio, and root tests with rigorous proofs.

title: Advanced Calculus Surface and Curve Integrals
desc: Solutions for surface and curve integrals involving parameterization, Stokes' theorem applications, and polar coordinate transformations in multivariable calculus.

title: Power Series Convergence and Summation Formulas
desc: Analyzes convergence domains and summation formulas for power series, including ln(1+x) and arctan expansions, with applications to ln2 and π/4.

title: Advanced Calculus: Metrics, Inequalities, and Open Sets
desc: A technical analysis covering metric spaces on continuous functions, the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality proof, and characterization of open sets in ℝⁿ.
